Because one way to feel your status rise is to see other people's status fall.  And it can't fall any further than getting abducted off the street and shipped off to a foreign gulag.  So MAGA bigots and sadists are happy with their guy and couldn't possibly care less what happens to prices as long as marginal groups are getting their teeth kicked in.  But of course you can not say out loud that you get sadistic gratification from watching the weakest members of society get abused, even to yourself.  So, they pretended they care about eggs...
